00034 // The action name is INTERNAL: it should be never shown to the user
00035 // if it contains a dot then the part before the dot is considered to
00036 // be a module name to be loaded when the
00037 
00038 // Known categories are: general (or empty), irc, script
00039 //
00040 
00041 class KviTalPopupMenu;
00042 class QWidget;
00043 class KviCustomToolBar;
00044 class QPixmap;
00045 class KviKvsScript;
00046 
00047 class KVIRC_API KviActionCategory
00048 {
00049 protected:
00050         QString m_szName;
00051         QString m_szVisibleName;
00052         QString m_szDescription;
00053 public:
00054         KviActionCategory(const QString &szName,const QString &szVisibleName,const QString &szDescription)
00055                 : m_szName(szName), m_szVisibleName(szVisibleName), m_szDescription(szDescription) {};
00056         ~KviActionCategory(){};
00057 public:
00058         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00059         const QString & visibleName(){ return m_szVisibleName; };
00060         const QString & description(){ return m_szDescription; };
00061 };
00062 
00063 // these flags are INTERNAL
00064 #define KVI_ACTION_FLAG_ENABLED 1
00065 #define KVI_ACTION_FLAG_SETUPDONE 2
00066 
00067 class KVIRC_API KviAction : public QObject
00068 {
00069         friend class KviActionManager;
00070         Q_OBJECT
00071 protected:
00072         QString m_szName;                               // the internal name of the action, must be in form [module.]name
00073         QString m_szVisibleName;
00074         QString m_szDescription;
00075         KviActionCategory * m_pCategory;                // may be 0, not owned!
00076         QString m_szBigIconId;
00077         QString m_szSmallIconId;
00078         KviPointerList<QWidget> * m_pWidgetList;
00079         unsigned short int m_uInternalFlags;
00080         unsigned int m_uFlags;
00081         QString m_szKeySequence;
00082         QShortcut * m_pAccel;
00083 public:
00084         enum Flags {
00085                 NeedsContext = 1,
00086                 NeedsConnection = 2,             // implies NeedsContext
00087                 WindowConsole = 4,
00088                 WindowChannel = 8,
00089                 WindowQuery = 16,
00090                 WindowDccChat = 32,
00091                 InternalWindowMask = WindowConsole | WindowChannel | WindowQuery | WindowDccChat,
00092                 EnableAtLogin = 64,              // implies NeedsConnection
00093                 WindowOnlyIfUsersSelected = 128  // implies at least one of WindowConsole | WindowChannel | WindowQuery
00094         };
00095 public:
00096         KviAction(QObject * pParent,                    // can be 0, but using a QObject will help in deleting this action :)
00097                         const QString &szName,                      // internal name of this action, in form [module.]name
00098                         const QString &szVisibleName,               // permanent visible name, visible at least in the action drawer
00099                         const QString &szDescription,               // what this action does ?
00100                         KviActionCategory * pCategory = NULL,       // one of KviActionManager::category*() or 0 (default category)
00101                         const QString &szBigIconId = QString(),
00102                         const QString &szSmallIconId = QString(),
00103                         unsigned int uFlags = 0,
00104                         const QString &szKeySequence = QString()
00105                 );
00106         virtual ~KviAction();
00107 public:
00108         static int validateFlags(int iFlagsToValidate);
00109         const QString & name() const { return m_szName; };
00110         virtual const QString & visibleName();
00111         virtual const QString & description();
00112         const QString & keySequence() const { return m_szKeySequence; };
00113         const QString & bigIconId() const { return m_szBigIconId; };
00114         const QString & smallIconId() const { return m_szSmallIconId; };
00115         KviActionCategory * category() const { return m_pCategory; };
00116         bool isEnabled() const { return (m_uInternalFlags & KVI_ACTION_FLAG_ENABLED); };
00117         unsigned int flags(){ return m_uFlags; };
00118         virtual bool isKviUserActionNeverOverrideThis();
00119         virtual void setEnabled(bool bEnabled);
00120         virtual QPixmap * smallIcon(); // FIXME: maybe doesn't need to be virtual anymore
00121         virtual QPixmap * bigIcon();   // FIXME: maybe doesn't need to be virtual anymore
00122         virtual bool addToPopupMenu(KviTalPopupMenu *pMenu);
00123         virtual QWidget * addToCustomToolBar(KviCustomToolBar *pParentToolBar);
00124         void suicide() { delete this; };
00125 protected:
00126         // called once before the FIRST button or menu item is created
00127         bool setupDone() const { return (m_uInternalFlags & KVI_ACTION_FLAG_SETUPDONE); };
00128         virtual void setup();
00129         KviPointerList<QWidget> * widgetList(){ return m_pWidgetList; };
00130         void registerAccelerator();
00131         void unregisterAccelerator();
00132         void registerWidget(QWidget * b);
00133 protected slots:
00134         virtual void widgetDestroyed();
00135         virtual void reloadImages();
00136         virtual void activeContextChanged();
00137         virtual void activeContextStateChanged();
00138         virtual void activeWindowChanged();
00139         virtual void activeWindowSelectionStateChanged(bool bSelectedNow);
00140 public slots:
00141         virtual void activate();
00142 signals:
00143         void activated();
00144 };
